data.title: Gohar Kheirandish Gallery â€“ Artebox
data.text:
Gohar Kheirandish in her teenage years, together with her uncles' children

Gohar Kheirandish (third person from the right)

Ghohar Kheirandish - Shuvaik show in World War II, written by Bertolt Bresht, directed by Farhad Majdabadi - Vahdat Hall (Roudaki), 1980

Gohar Kheirandish - stage show of the New Tenant

Gohar Kheirandish - Make-up test for the film Thirteen Cats on the Roof

Gohar Kheirandish - Make-up test for the non-profit police movie, directed by Yadollah Samadi - 2008

Gohar Kheirandish - the initial make-up test of the movie Banoo, directed by Dariush Mehrjooei - 1991

Gohar Kheirandish - the role of a mermaid in the Jazireye Jadoo series, directed by Siamak Shayeghi

Gohar Kheirandish - the role of a pirate in the Jazireye Jadoo series, directed by Siamak Shayeghi - 2003

Gohar Kheirandish (left) - academic thesis on the play Cavemen by William Saroyan, Shapour Pouramin and Azita Salehi

Gohar Kheirandish (lying down) in her first film called childhood, together with Parvin Soleimani, Shokouh Najmabadi and Khosro Masoumi

Gohar Kheirandish (second from the left) - behind the scenes of Rozi Roozegari series, director Amrollah Ahmadjoo - 1992

Gohar Kheirandish (second from the left), Siavash Tahmoures (third from the left) - Cycle of Fire show, directed by Siavash Tahmoures - 1999

Gohar Kheirandish (third person from the left) - Pahlavan Kachal show, author Ali Nasirian, director Hamid Mozafari, Esmailkhani, Habib Dehghan Nasab

Gohar Kheirandish (third person sitting from the left) - New tenant show, writer and director Reza Karam Rezaei

Gohar Kheirandish and Jamshid Esmailkhani - Green in autumn show, directed by Nasser Farhoudi

Gohar Kheirandish in her first theater called Az No, directed by Hamid Mozafari and played by Majid Afsharian and Mehdi Afsharian

Gohar Kheirandish, Jamshid Esmailkhani - Gohar Khairandish, Jamshid Ismail Khani - behind the scenes of Khorshid, Zeitoun, Darya, directed by Reza Fayazi (1)

Gohar Kheirandish, Jamshid Esmailkhani - Gohar Khairandish, Jamshid Ismail Khani - behind the scenes of Khorshid, Zeitoun, Darya, directed by Reza Fayazi (2)

Right to left - Anonymous, Sadra Hejazi, Jamshid Mashayekhi, Gohar Kheirandish, Nozar Azari, Akbar Esfahani - behind the scenes of the willow branches

Right to left - Farrokh Nemati, Hamid Samandarian, Mirtaher Mazloumi, Gohar Kheirandish - Meeting of the old lady

The first meeting with Jamshid Esmailkhani as a director for Arous Theater

Right to left - Shohreh Soltani, Jale Alov, Gohar Kheirandish (the fifth person) - Behind the scenes of Rozi Rozegari, director Amraollah Ahmadjoo

Standing from the right - Daniyal Hakimi, Hassan Zarei, Gohar Kheirandish, Hadi Eslami, Ghasem Pakroo, Rahmani, Ali Gohari, Faridi -Prometheus in Chains show

Standing from the right - Mohammadreza Golzar, Mohammadreza Sharifinia, Meryla Zarei, sitting from the right - Mahnaz Afshar, Gohar Kheirandish - Thirteen Cats on the Roof, 2003

Right to left - Alireza Jafari, Gohar Kheirandish, Matin Sotoudeh, Behnoush Sadeghi, Pejman Bazeghi - movie Another House, directed by Behnoush Sadeghi - 2015

Right to left - Elika Abdol Razzaghi, Gohar Kheirandish, Mohammad Reza Golzar, Amin Hayaei - Made in Iran series, directed by Mohammad Hossein Latifi - 2012
